Articles.Content: When I try to launch KSP, it gets stuck on loading expansions, and stops, though I have no expansions. I have checked, and it is up to date. Is there any way to fix KSP so I can play again? It just stays like that forever and doesn't go to title screen!

It is very helpful for the people doing the troubleshooting, if you would supply a list of mods you have installed (I'm assuming you have mods because this is the forum for modded installs), and any log files.
